description: An appliance company sells and installs refrigerators and stoves. Each refrigerator takes \param{MoverTimeRefrigerator} minutes of mover time and \param{SetupTimeRefrigerator} minutes of setup time. Each stove takes \param{MoverTimeStove} minutes of mover time and \param{SetupTimeStove} minutes of setup time. The company has available \param{TotalMoverTime} minutes of mover time and \param{TotalSetupTime} minutes of setup time. If the profit per refrigerator is $\param{ProfitRefrigerator} and the profit per stove is $\param{ProfitStove}, how many of each should they sell in order to maximize profit?
